Description: Jarir Marketing (known as: Jarir) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since December 2003. Jarir operates within the Retailing sector focusing on Specialty Stores. It has Companies operating across Northern Africa and Middle East. Jarir is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in October 2000.
